name: Mado Fuki Kaisha no Swing-kun
overview: In Swing you control a man that has to wash the windows of several skyscrapers. Dirty windows have a grey color and clean windows are blue. The skycraper's windows form a sort of maze-like pattern as you can only climb up or down on or next to a window. While washing the windows of the skyscrapers you are pursued by several hostile monsters and if they catch you, you 'll lose a life. When all windows are cleaned you have to enter the skyscraper through the front door to go to the next round.
